title: Short-term Mobile Empowerment Workshop for Digitally Marginalized Elderly Women

context.additional_context: Mobile-centric educational environment for adult learners in geographically underserved areas, aimed at strengthening digital literacy competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can independently use five or more mobile apps necessary for daily life.
Learners can apply basic digital security principles (password setting, personal information management) to their work.
Learners complete a project to produce and share language-learning content using mobile devices.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
